use of a private jet so he can fly between LA and London in comfort. But Simon Cowell has told the panicking bosses that the relentless travelling will be "too gruelling" . A source said: They are at their wit's end. "The X Factor is ITV's biggest show and they can't afford for it to flop. It's getting to the point where they are literally willing to do anything in order to persuade Simon Cowell to appear in the live shows. "But the simple fact is he can't be in two places at once and he's not sure he wants to be. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from DEnver Lisin last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
